headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TISHMAN, JOHN L

snippet: TISHMAN--John L. The entire Montefiore and Einstein family is deeply saddened by the passing of John L. Tishman, beloved father of our esteemed Trustee and benefactor Daniel R. Tishman. The Tishman family has been a longtime supporter of Montefiore Health System's innovative therapies and clinical best practices and of Albert Einstein College of Medicine's pioneering medical research and education programs. To Dan, his wife, Sheryl, and the entire Tishman family, we extend our heartfelt condolences. Steven M. Safyer, M.D. President and CEO Montefiore Health System; Allen M. Spiegel, M.D. The Marilyn and Stanley M. Katz Dean Albert Einstein College of Medicine; David A. Tanner, Chair, Board of Trustees, Montefiore Health System; Roger W. Einiger, Chair, Board of Trustees, Albert Einstein College of Medicine 1/3
